program main
    implicit none
    character(1000) :: str
    integer :: counts(0:255) = 0
    integer :: i, oddCount, len_str, ascii
    character :: c

    read(*, '(A)') str
    len_str = len_trim(str)

    do i = 1, len_str
        c = str(i:i)
        ascii = ichar(c)
        counts(ascii) = counts(ascii) + 1
    end do

    oddCount = 0
    do i = 0, 255
        if (mod(counts(i), 2) /= 0) then
            oddCount = oddCount + 1
        end if
    end do

    if (oddCount <= 1 .or. mod(oddCount, 2) /= 0) then
        print '(A)', 'First'
    else
        print '(A)', 'Second'
    end if
end program main
